title: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/nidzo732/SecureMessaging
message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/nidzo732/SecureMessaging

title: Server: removed old MessageModel, better responses
message:
Server: removed old MessageModel, better responses

- Removed old MessageModel from the code, and from indexes
- Responses that are displayed in browser, and not used for REST are now more meaningful for the users
- clearusers cron job now logs deleted users
- Switched to new GCM URL used for sending messages
- Fixed a wrong action attribute, for the form in renameadmin page
- Mail API sometimes fails to send for no reason, retry 3 times before giving up
- Notify users of badly formated emails
- Got weird requests from some kind of search bot on 204.79.180.* subnet, the subnet is now blacklisted in dos.yaml

title: WinRT: removed unnecessary imports from RenamePage
message: WinRT: removed unnecessary imports from RenamePage

title: WinRT: added support for renaming users
message:
WinRT: added support for renaming users

- Windows Runtime client now has the option to rename user accounts
- ConversationListItem now just stores a Message instance, instead of
  various properties to be displayed
- moved progress indicators away from title-bars for better visibility

title: Android: support for user renaming
message:
Android: support for user renaming

- Added ability to rename users in Android client
- Improved DataStorage to support deletion of items, mainly to delete old user data when renaming

title: Python: added option to rename user
message:
Python: added option to rename user

- added option to rename the user account in Python client

title: server: ability to rename user
message:
server: ability to rename user

- added ability to rename users on the server, it can be done by an administrator (via web interface), or by the user himself (via HTTP request)

title: Android: added blinking unread indicator
message:
Android: added blinking unread indicator

- added a new indicator that blinks when there are unread messages in another conversation

title: Android: display peer name in action bar
message:
Android: display peer name in action bar

- peer name on the conversation page is now displayed as action bar title, the peerName TextView is removed

title: WinRT: conversation list items more descriptive
message:
WinRT: conversation list items more descriptive

- items in the list of conversations now display the date of the last
  message, and a part of its text (just like on old Windows 8 client)

title: Android: conversation UI redesign
message:
Android: conversation UI redesign

- ConversationsActivity is now merged into ConversationActivity - added a drawer with a list of conversations using DrawerLayout
- redesigned ConversationListAdapter and conversation list item to fit the new model

title: Server: improved message model
message:
Server: improved message model

- created a new message model class which stores all message data as a single JSON string to reduce the number of datastore operations, JSON is encoded and decoded on the fly
- messages are no longer guaranteed to be ordered by timestamp, all ordering has to be done by the clients

title: Renamed individual client folders
message: Renamed individual client folders

title: WinRT:switched to Windows 10, Windows 8 deprecated
message:
WinRT:switched to Windows 10, Windows 8 deprecated

- created new universal app client for windows 10, windows 8 code deleted
- redesigned app to fit into windows 10 better
- unified conversation page, conversation list now displayed on a side pane
- removed dependency on WinRTXamlToolkit - implemented own InputDialog
- accent color applied to more UI elements
- accent color used on desktop client too
- filepicker code is now the same on both clients, no more need to worry
  about resuming on Windows Phone
- better and more secure handling of timeDiff - large timediffs are
  treated as insecure, non-numeric time strings are rejected

title: server: added website, reduced datastore writes
message:
server: added website, reduced datastore writes

- removed some properties from MessageModel
- turned of indexing for some properties in MessageModel and UserKey to reduce the number of datastore writes
- delete file-messages immediately instead of marking them as unread (this reduces datastore writes), Blobs themselves are deleted by a cron-job
- added a basic website for the application
- added ability for the administrator to re-send a recovery email
- logged errors now include a stack trace
- names with exotic characters are rejected with a proper error message, insteadof causing an exception

title: Python: better timeDiff handling
message:
Python: better timeDiff handling

- reject timeDiff strings that are not numbers
- reject timeDiffs bigger than 3600 secconds
- better error description strings

title: Android: better time difference handling
message:
Android: better time difference handling

- timeDiff responses that are not numbers are rejected elegantly instead of crashing
- timeDiffs bigger than one hour are rejected - the server could be malicious
- error messages for unknown errors now give more information

title: Android: localized help
message:
Android: localized help

- Documentation HTML files are now separated for different languages
- Switched to new gradle version

title: Android: unhide sender ID
message:
Android: unhide sender ID

- there is no need to keep GCM sender ID hidden in a separate file so it was moved GCMHandling.java
- minor refactoring of Android code

title: Javascript: display unread count in title
message:
Javascript: display unread count in title

- display the number of conversations with unread messages in the title text

title: Javascript: handle enter presses better
message:
Javascript: handle enter presses better

- Added send-on-enter behaviour. Shift+Enter adds newline to message

title: Removed jquery.js that came with JQueryUI
message: Removed jquery.js that came with JQueryUI

title: Added Javascript client
message:
Added Javascript client

- created a new client application written with javascript/html/css, supports all features found in other clients, uses channel api for instant delivery
- the javascript client is available on the server, only for admin account (me) currently
- added channel api support to server code, although it's locked for now, due to low quotas
- minor refactoring of server code

title: WinRT: add signature support
message:
WinRT: add signature support

- Added support for signatures in WinRT client
- Refactoring: move all dialog window code in a single class

title: Android: added signature support
message:
Android: added signature support

	- Added option to sign messages to Android client

title: WinRt: move set password page
message:
WinRt: move set password page

- Just like with android, the set password page was originally accessed from the login page, this enabled the user to go straight to that page without logging in. If the user hasn't logged in before, this would cause the set password page to try to use a nonexistent token. This way, the user is forced to log in first, which eliminates the posibility of a nonexistent token.

WinRT: prevent notifier from running when app is active

  this kind of behaviour is now disabled
